title: 'RiotGames' is not a valid short file name. Cannot uninstall or reinstall.
body: My storage HDD died so I replaced it, my computer still believes that League of Legends is still installed, I cannot reinstall or uninstall the game as the error pops up and the whole process closes. I deleted everything I could find related to League of Legends in my registry, I don't know if this was bad or good, but it didn't fix anything.

replies.body: No worries, our [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) could help!  Download it to do a clean reinstall or uninstall to get all that stuff sorted out.  It should do the trick, but let me know if you still have any issues!
